metadata.title: BELGIAN REAL ESTATE ASSISTANT
metadata.welcomeMessage: Welcome to your personal Belgian real estate assistant!
metadata.capabilityDescription: I can help you find the best property deals, rental prices, and investment opportunities
metadata.additionalInfo: Compare prices across different cities and districts in Belgium

documents.Title: Brussels Real Estate - Apartment Rental Prices by District
documents.Content: Ixelles rental prices: 1-bedroom ‚Ç¨800-1200/month, 2-bedroom ‚Ç¨1200-1800/month, 3-bedroom ‚Ç¨1600-2400/month. Etterbeek: 1-bedroom ‚Ç¨700-1000/month, 2-bedroom ‚Ç¨1000-1500/month, 3-bedroom ‚Ç¨1400-2000/month. Uccle premium: 1-bedroom ‚Ç¨900-1400/month, 2-bedroom ‚Ç¨1400-2200/month, 3-bedroom ‚Ç¨1800-3000/month. Saint-Gilles trendy: 1-bedroom ‚Ç¨750-1100/month, 2-bedroom ‚Ç¨1100-1700/month. Best value: Schaerbeek ‚Ç¨650-950/month for 1-bedroom, emerging neighborhood with good transport links.

documents.Title: Antwerp Housing Market - Rental vs Purchase Comparison
documents.Content: Antwerp rental market: City center 1-bedroom ‚Ç¨700-1000/month, 2-bedroom ‚Ç¨1000-1500/month. Zuid district premium: 1-bedroom ‚Ç¨800-1200/month, 2-bedroom ‚Ç¨1200-1800/month. Purchase prices: City center ‚Ç¨250,000-400,000 for 2-bedroom, ‚Ç¨350,000-600,000 for 3-bedroom. Emerging areas: Berchem ‚Ç¨200,000-350,000 for 2-bedroom, Deurne ‚Ç¨180,000-300,000. Investment tip: Zuid district shows 5-8% annual appreciation, best long-term value.

documents.Title: Ghent Student Housing - University District Comparison
documents.Content: Student housing near UGent campus: Student rooms ‚Ç¨300-500/month including utilities, Student studios ‚Ç¨450-700/month, Shared apartments ‚Ç¨350-550/month per room. Patershol historic area: Premium student housing ‚Ç¨500-800/month, walking distance to campus. Coupure area: Mid-range options ‚Ç¨400-600/month, 15-minute bike ride to university. Budget options: Ledeberg district ‚Ç¨280-450/month, good public transport. Best deals: University housing ‚Ç¨250-400/month, limited availability, apply early.

documents.Title: Leuven Property Investment - ROI Analysis by Area
documents.Content: Leuven investment properties ROI: City center rental yield 4-6% annually, high demand from students and professionals. Near KU Leuven campus: Student housing yields 6-8%, properties ‚Ç¨200,000-350,000. Kessel-Lo residential: Family homes yield 4-5%, properties ‚Ç¨300,000-500,000, stable long-term growth. Heverlee upscale: Luxury properties yield 3-4%, ‚Ç¨400,000-800,000, premium market. Investment strategy: Student housing offers highest yields but requires active management, family homes provide stable appreciation.

documents.Title: Belgian Coastal Properties - Seaside Real Estate Prices
documents.Content: Ostend beachfront apartments: Sea view 2-bedroom ‚Ç¨300,000-500,000, inland 2-bedroom ‚Ç¨200,000-350,000, seasonal rental yield 8-12%. Knokke luxury market: Beachfront properties ‚Ç¨500,000-2,000,000+, exclusive area with international buyers. Blankenberge family market: 2-bedroom apartments ‚Ç¨180,000-320,000, popular with Belgian families, rental yield 6-9%. De Panne budget coastal: Properties ‚Ç¨150,000-280,000, emerging area near French border. Seasonal strategy: Buy in winter (10-15% lower prices), rent during summer season for maximum ROI.

documents.Title: Li√®ge Property Market - Affordable Housing Options
documents.Content: Li√®ge affordable housing: City center 2-bedroom ‚Ç¨120,000-220,000, 3-bedroom ‚Ç¨180,000-300,000, excellent value for money. Guillemins station area: Renovated apartments ‚Ç¨150,000-280,000, benefit from high-speed rail connectivity to Brussels. Student quarter near ULi√®ge: Investment properties ‚Ç¨100,000-200,000, rental yield 7-10%. Angleur suburban: Family homes ‚Ç¨200,000-350,000, 20-minute commute to city center. Renovation opportunities: Historic properties ‚Ç¨80,000-150,000, potential for 20-30% value increase after renovation.

documents.Title: Brussels Luxury Real Estate - Premium Market Analysis
documents.Content: Brussels luxury districts: Uccle mansions ‚Ç¨800,000-3,000,000+, Woluw√©-Saint-Lambert ‚Ç¨600,000-1,500,000, Watermael-Boitsfort ‚Ç¨500,000-1,200,000. Embassy quarter premium: Properties near embassies ‚Ç¨700,000-2,500,000, high demand from diplomats and executives. Penthouse market: Brussels city center penthouses ‚Ç¨600,000-2,000,000, panoramic views, luxury amenities. International buyers: EU officials prefer Uccle/Woluw√©, multinational executives choose city center, investment funds target rental properties. Market trends: Luxury market stable, 2-4% annual appreciation, strong rental demand ‚Ç¨2,000-5,000/month.

documents.Title: Belgian Property Investment Strategy - Regional Comparison
documents.Content: Investment comparison by region: Brussels highest prices but stable demand, rental yields 3-5%. Antwerp balanced market, yields 4-6%, strong economic growth. Ghent university town advantage, student housing yields 6-8%. Coastal areas seasonal but high summer yields 8-12%. Li√®ge and Charleroi affordable entry points, yields 6-9%, urban renewal opportunities. Tax considerations: Registration fees 10-12.5% of property value, rental income taxed as regular income. Financing: Belgian banks offer 80-90% LTV for residents, 70-80% for non-residents, interest rates 2-4% (2025).
